subject: [PATCH v6 3/3] fuse: add an implementation of open+getattr

reviews.author: Joanne Koong
reviews.summary: Identified a potential issue with the current implementation and suggested an alternative approach to improve efficiency.

2026-02-27.patch_summary: Joanne suggested a more efficient way to handle compound open+getattr by checking if the attribute valid time is before the current time, and only sending the compound operation if true.
